word: ANOTHER PURPOSE SERVED BY THE READING OF HISTORY AND THE  LIFE OF OUR LORD [THIS MAY REFER TO WILLIAM HANNA'S LIFE OF OUR LORD (1863).] AND THE LIFE OF ST. PAUL, WAS THAT IN SO DOING THERE WAS BROUGHT VIVIDLY TO HER MIND SCENES PRESENTED CLEARLY IN VISION, BUT WHICH WERE THROUGH THE LAPSE OF YEARS AND HER STRENUOUS MINISTRY, DIMMED IN HER MEMORY.
